edited_stories.edited_story_text: We had a great Halloween party at our house. Our dog Rufus helped supervise the decorations. My husband Matt's college buddies dressed up as ninjas. Our neighbors Pat and Tom had funny costumes. Rufus wasn't impressed, though. He just wanted everyone to leave so he could go to sleep! The party started to wind down at 12 a.m.  Luckily my cousins Jane, Meg, and Fanny helped clean up the kitchen so Rufus was able to go to bed by 1 a. m.
